sqlMap.statement:
select dloadkey,dloadname,dloadtype,auditstat,appname,apptime,auditname,audittime,flag,minnum,maxnum,pagenum ,appdesc from t18_download t where t.appname in (SELECT DISTINCT T1.USERNAME FROM T00_USER T1, T00_COM_AUTH T3, T00_ROLE_AUTH T4 WHERE T1.USERNAME = T3.USERNAME AND T3.ROLEKEY = T4.ROLEKEY AND T1.FLAG = '1' and t4.modulekey IN ('240310') and t3.groupkey = #groupkey# ) and t.auditstat = '1'
t.dloadkey = #dloadkey#
t.dloadname like '%$dloadname$%'
t.dloadtype = #dloadtype#
t.auditstat = #auditstat#
order by t.apptime desc

select count(*) from t18_download t where t.appname in (SELECT DISTINCT T1.USERNAME FROM T00_USER T1, T00_COM_AUTH T3, T00_ROLE_AUTH T4 WHERE T1.USERNAME = T3.USERNAME AND T3.ROLEKEY = T4.ROLEKEY AND T1.FLAG = '1' and t4.modulekey IN ('240310') and t3.groupkey = #groupkey# )and t.auditstat = '1'
t.dloadkey like '%$dloadkey$%'
t.dloadname like '%$dloadname$%'
t.dloadtype = #dloadtype#
t.auditstat = #auditstat#

select dloadkey,dloadname,dloadtype,auditstat,appname,apptime,auditname,audittime,flag,minnum,maxnum,pagenum,t2.USETIME,t2.BEGINTIME,t2.ENDTIME,t2.CALSTATUS,t1.auditdesc from t18_download t1 left JOIN T18_ONLINE_TASK_FACT t2 ON t1.DLOADKEY = t2.TASKKEY
t1.dloadkey like '%$dloadkey_query$%'
t1.appname = #appname#
t1.dloadname like '%$dloadname$%'
t1.dloadtype = #dloadtype#
t1.auditstat = #auditstat#
t1.apptime >= #app_begintime#
t1.apptime <= #app_endtime#
order by t1.apptime desc

select count(*) from t18_download t1 left JOIN T18_ONLINE_TASK_FACT t2 ON t1.DLOADKEY = t2.TASKKEY
t1.dloadkey like '%$dloadkey_query$%'
t1.dloadname like '%$dloadname$%'
t1.appname = #appname#
t1.dloadtype = #dloadtype#
t1.auditstat = #auditstat#
t1.apptime >= #app_begintime#
t1.apptime <= #app_endtime#
select dloadkey from t18_download t1 INNER JOIN T18_ONLINE_TASK_FACT t2 ON t1.DLOADKEY = t2.TASKKEY where t2.CALSTATUS ='4' and t1.flag in ('1','4')
update T18_download set flag=#flag# where dloadkey=#dloadkey#
